name: Duksa Pizza
about: Thin crusty pizza, prepared in wood oven. Fresh basil, organic garlic, extravirgin olive oil. Interior that makes you wanna stay. Forever.

about: 'World class flavour' has been our guiding idea since the very beginning and today –  it’s our motto.

name: Japanese restaurant Tekka
about: Japanese restaurant Tekka offers a wide variety of japanese specialties such as sushi, sashimi, nigri, big rolls, hosomaki, uramaki, teppanyaki, tenpura, fusion, wok and sake with affordable prices. Indulge your senses in fantastic specialities from the japanese cuisine.

name: Dubravkin Put
about: Located in the Tuškanac forest, just a few minutes’ walk from the very centre of the city, Dubravkin put is both a restaurant and a wine bar. Its interior is warm and contemporary, while its terrace has a beautiful view of the park and forest. Our philosophy is about offering an innovative dining concept which reflects a Mediterranean influence. The Mediterranean cuisine, with the menu designed by our chef Priska Thuring, and professional and helpful staff  will offer each guest a delicious, elegant and sophisticated experience. Our professionalism, attention to detail and the combination of tradition and innovation will not leave you indifferent.
